titleStmt.title: A pleasant commodie, called Looke about you As it was lately played by the right honourable the Lord High Admirall his seruaunts
Look about you.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Edward Allde] for William Ferbrand, and are to be solde at his shop at the signe of the Crowne neere Guild-hall gate,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A pleasant commody called Looke about you.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Crowne neere Guild-hall gate
